ygData.subject: Ring Recommendation
ygData.msgSnippet: Somehow I lost one of my rings ÔÇô I forget the name it was a +7 Cha/+5 Dex (the other that I have is +5 Cha/ +7 Dex).  IÔÇÖm not sure if it was due to a bug
ygData.messageBody:
Somehow I lost one of my rings ┬û I forget the name it was a +7 Cha/+5 Dex
(the other that I have is +5 Cha/ +7 Dex). I┬Æm not sure if it was due to a
bug ┬û or I left it on corpse the last time I looted it ┬û but regardless don┬Æ
t see the point of trying to petition for a 200p item (that I doubt will get
resolved positively anyway).

Just curious what you all recommend for a 52 Bard.

A buddy of mine is selling a pair of SS Vambraces ┬û couldn┬Æt hook up last
night ┬û but will tonight!

PS Gaelethorne ┬û if I was a betting man ┬û I┬Æd bet on you beating me to 53 ┬û
I don┬Æt put a priority on leveling and have been doing a lot stuff like
raids, grouping with lower level friends and guildies fighting ┬û
green-to-me ┬û and need to get a HS key one of these days┬à Good luck!

Slyde
